longBusinessSummary.0: Petronet LNG Limited engages in the import, regasification, and supply of liquefied natural gas (LNG) in India. It owns and operates a LNG import and regasification terminal with name plate capacity of 17.5 MMTPA located in Dahej, Gujarat; and a LNG terminal with name plate capacity of 5 MMTPA located in Kochi, Kerala. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in New Delhi, India.
